code: import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AddListButton=_ref=>{let{onAdd}=_ref;const handleAdd=()=>{const newList={id:"list-".concat(Date.now()),name:'New List',color:'#8B5CF6',tasks:[]};onAdd(newList);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleAdd,className:"px-4 py-2 rounded-full bg-dodash-purple bg-opacity-20 hover:bg-opacity-40 transition-all duration-200",children:"+ New List"});};export default AddListButton;
